author: barvic
body:
75X - The CSC Unpacker side fix for handling of rare case CFEB data corruption, which could cause assertion failure in CSC Segment RECO module.

Original issue is described at https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/recoDevelopment/1391.html
Assertion failure is triggered, when number of expected time bins in CFEB data is not equal to 8.
title: 75X - Fix for handling of rare case of CFEB data corruption
